element.name: Bladetide: Realm of Fauldis
element.description: Realm of Fauldis is a dimension of heroic god-less fantasy inside Bladetide Multiverse. Large amounts of magical energy that is mystically produced by the planet Fauldis and possibly it's system, force elemental mutations, natural disasters and fast growth of humanoid population, thus making it both dangerous and romantic.

element.name: Fauldis: Nightmare
element.description: Bladetide Campaign, about turning point in history, where few people decide fate of the magic and all living creatures with it.
